original_title: Muminpappans bravader - En ung Mumins äventyr
overview: A beautiful summer day in Moomin Valley. Suddenly, a wasp stings Moomintroll, who falls ill and has to stay in bed. To cheer him up, Moominpappa recounts his youthful adventures; his misunderstood childhood, escape from an orphanage and his historic meeting with the inventor Hodgkins.
title: The Exploits of Moominpappa – Adventures of a Young Moomin
